articles.title: Delegation of Rodong Sinmun Back Home
articles.content:
Delegation of Rodong Sinmun Back Home
 Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Rodong Sinmun led by Vice Editor-in-Chief Ri Kyong Sop returned home on Tuesday after visiting Vietnam.

articles.title: National Exhibition of Sports Scientific, Technological Achievements Opens
articles.content:
National Exhibition of Sports Scientific, Technological Achievements Opens
 Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- A national exhibition of sports scientific and technological achievements was opened at the Ice Rink on Tuesday.
					 On display there are at least 140 computer programs, more than 120 scientific measuring apparatuses and sports apparatuses and many sports medicines and nutrients produced by over 110 units.
					
					 Present there were officials concerned, scientists and technicians in the field of physical culture and sports and officials in charge of science and technology of sports teams.
					
					 Ri Jong Mu, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, in an opening address said that progress has been made in the work to contrive and develop valuable computer programs, sports apparatuses and medicines conducive to the development of the nation's sports thanks to the devoted efforts of scientists and technicians across the country.
					
					 He called upon the participants to put all sports processes on an IT and scientific basis, explore new areas of sports science and technology and thereby contribute to exalting the dignity and honor of Juche Korea.
					
					 Then the participants went round scientific and technological achievements on display.

articles.title: Geothermal, Solar Heat in Effective Use in Munsu Water Park
articles.content:
Geothermal, Solar Heat in Effective Use in Munsu Water Park
 Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- The indoor wading pool and gymnasium in the Munsu Water Park draw a number of people even in this winter season.
					 The pool and gymnasium are provided with geothermal and solar heat.
					
					 The indoor temperature and water are warm as geotherm takes a large share of the energy necessary for the heating system.
					
					 Solar heat also plays an effective role in conditioning the pool and gymnasium with huge glass roofs of pyramid shape for greenhouse effect. 
					
					 The utilization of geothermal and solar heat has a wide prospect in the field of construction in the DPRK.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams S. Korean Authorities for Pursuing Confrontation Policy
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams S. Korean Authorities for Pursuing Confrontation Policy
 Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- It is a "national policy" of the present south Korean authorities to pursue confrontation between fellow countrymen, not confidence and reconciliation. Its despicable true colors have been brought to light once again. 
					 This is clearly evidenced by the fact that the puppet Ministry of Unification of south Korea recently presented the "second principal plan for the development of south-north relations" to the "National Assembly" after finally confirming it as the orientation of the "north policy" to be followed by the regime in the five years to come. The "plan" deleted all matters included in the historic October 4 declaration such as the issues of establishing a special zone for peace and cooperation in the West Sea and turning the armistice mechanism into a peace-keeping one, etc. contained in the "first plan for the development of south-north relations." Instead, the "second plan" included such undesirable points as "nuclear issue of the north" and "human rights issue of the north". 
					
					 This is a total denial of the north-south joint declarations and an unpardonable provocation to the DPRK. 
					
					 By doing so, the south Korean puppet authorities formally declared that they would pursue confrontation with the north to the last. 
					
					 Whoever desires the development of the north-south relations to a new phase of peace and co-prosperity can never deny the above-said parts of the October 4 declaration which they deleted from their "second plan". 
					
					 By formally repudiating the above-said points the authorities openly revealed their attitude of denying the historic north-south joint declarations and their sinister intention not to work for co-prosperity of the nation. 
					
					 The issues they added to the "plan" are nothing but vicious confrontation slogans they used to chant in a bid to disarm the DPRK in collusion with outside forces and realize the ambition to "bring down its social system". 
					
					 The inter-Korean relations had developed into reconciliation and cooperation since the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.     
					
					 These ties, however, were driven into catastrophe, creating an extremely tense situation, because the puppet forces have desperately sought cooperation in the campaign against the DPRK in a bid to put those confrontation scenarios into practice. 
					
					 During her recent foreign trips the chief executive of south Korea begged for cooperation in confrontation with fellow countrymen. Not content with this, she is working hard to make the total collapse of the inter-Korean relations an established fact by fixing it legally and institutionally. Herein lies the gravity of the situation. 
					
					 This made it clearer that such rubbish as "confidence" and the like  much touted by Park Geun Hye and her group are nothing but hypocrisy intended to cover up their true colors as confrontation maniacs. 
					
					 It is natural that the south Korean people of different social standings express deep concern, saying that the recent development "brought to light the confrontation attitude towards the north". 
					
					 The history of the north-south relations shows that no confrontation maniacs met a good end. It was proved by the ends of traitor Syngman Rhee, the "yusin" dictator and the disgraceful fate of traitor Lee Myung Bak. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to bear in mind that what they will gain through confrontation will be nothing but a more miserable fate than that of the predecessors.

articles.title: Mass Resistance against Revival of "Yusin" Dictatorship Called for
articles.content:
Mass Resistance against Revival of "Yusin" Dictatorship Called for
 Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- A horrible whirlwind of suppression is now being kicked up against progressive and democratic forces in south Korea against the backdrop of open revival of the "yusin" dictatorship.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in an article in this regard:
					
					 The south Korean regime's fascist suppression of the progressive and democratic forces is a revelation of its sinister scenario to dampen the desire of the south Koreans for democracy, tide over the ever-deepening ruling crisis and realize the ambition for its long-term office.
					
					 All facts go to prove that the "yusin" dictatorship the mere mention of which makes the south Korean people tremble with fear is being fully revived. This deplorable situation in south Korea calls upon the people from all walks of life to turn out in a mass struggle against the revival of the "yusin" dictatorship.
					
					 The south Koreans have a shining tradition of the struggle for democracy in which they drove the fascist ruling quarters into ruin through heroic resistance, not yielding to injustice and dictatorship. Now is the time for the south Korean people to rise up in the all-people resistance for defending democracy by inheriting the spirit and stamina of the martyrs.
					
					 If the fascist repressive moves of the conservative group are not shattered, south Korea will be brought back to the past "yusin" dictatorship and the working masses will suffer from the dictatorial rule.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Dismisses U.S. Talk about Non-aggression Treaty as Hypocritical
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Dismisses U.S. Talk about Non-aggression Treaty as Hypocritical 
 Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is now crying out for the denuclearization of the DPRK while talking about a non-aggression treaty, though it seeks to bring down the latter's social system and occupy its territory.  This is the height of its shamelessness and craftiness. Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes this in an article. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 Clear is the aim sought by the U.S. in talking about its shameless and crafty non-aggression treaty while asserting that it would be friendly towards the DPRK when the latter dismantles its nukes. Its objective is to bring to the DPRK the same distress as what the Balkans, Iraq and Libya suffered in the wake of falling victims to imperialists' aggression after giving up their war deterrence,  yielding to their pressure and taken in by their appeasement. 
					
					 The same can be said of the U.S. talk about measures for denuclearization of the DPRK which the former put up as a precondition for concluding the non-aggression treaty. 
					
					 The DPRK's dismantlement of its nukes first is not same as the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula in the conception. 
					
					 It is quite evident that the peninsula can hardly be denuclearized even after the DPRK dismantles its nuclear weapons under the situation where the U.S. openly makes nuclear blackmail against it after massively deploying nuclear strike means. In case this happens, the danger of war on the peninsula can not be defused but peaceful environment will be destroyed. 
					
					 This will not be confined to the peninsula only. The peninsula is the strategic vantage where the interests of the world nuclear powers are intertwined and the biggest nuclear arsenal in the world. A spark on the peninsula will, therefore, plunge not only the U.S. but the rest of the world into the scourge of a nuclear war. 
					
					 If the U.S. truly hopes for the improvement of the relations with the DPRK, it should stop calling for conditional dialogue and the improvement of the relations and making a brigandish  assertion that it will conclude a non-aggression treaty with the DPRK only when the latter dismantles its nukes first.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Japan's Sinister Scenario for Overseas Invasion
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Japan's Sinister Scenario for Overseas Invasion 
 Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- Japanese Prime Minister Abe insisted on the justice of setting up a "national security council" at the meeting of the House of Councillors on Nov. 8., claiming that Japan's security environment is further disturbed by the DPRK's "nuclear and missile threat."
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This indicates that the Japanese reactionaries' moves for militarization have reached their height.
					
					 It is the only aim of the "national security council" to work out a "national security strategy" and realize Japan's ambitions for militarization and overseas invasion under the pretext of the DPRK's "nuclear and missile threat".
					
					 It is the invariable scenario of the Japanese reactionaries to realize the "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere" which they failed to do during the Second World War.
					
					 They have driven the chariot of militarism at breakneck speed.
					
					 The present Japanese government, blinded by its ambition for overseas invasion, has made desperate efforts to lay down the institutional and legal framework for overseas invasion as evidenced by its moves to reorganize the "Self-Defence Forces" into "National Defence Army" and retrogressively revise the constitution, etc. 
					
					 Japan's "Self-Defence Forces" are being armed with the latest war hardware for overseas invasion.
					
					 The Japanese authorities should bear in mind that the moves stepped up by them for turning Japan into a military giant and launching overseas invasion under the pretext of non-existent threat from others would only precipitate their own self-destruction.

articles.title: Strong Action against Fascist Repression Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Strong Action against Fascist Repression Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- The Kwangju Solidarity for Progress and the South Jolla Provincial Solidarity for Progress in south Korea held a rally at the plaza of Kwangju Railway Station on Nov. 16 to judge the puppet authorities keen to revive the dictatorship and forcibly disband the progressive political party and organizations.
					 At the rally speakers accused the Park Geun Hye regime of intensifying the crackdown in a bid to remove hurdles lying in establishing a dictatorial system, adding that they turned out in actions, unable to tolerate it.
					
					 They declared that people would bring down the Park Geun Hye dictatorship and build society based on independence, democracy, peace, reunification and equality. The more brutal suppression gets, the fiercer the actions will become, they noted.
					
					 Then the participants in the rally marched as far as Kumnam Avenue.
					
					 While the demonstration was under way, they held a rally outside the Kwangju City office of the "Saenuri Party" at which they strongly demanded the abolition of the "Security Law", dissolution of the ruling party and the Intelligence Service and the arrest of its director.

articles.title: Candlelight Rally Held in Seoul
articles.content:
Candlelight Rally Held in Seoul
 Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- The Emergency Situation Council to Denounce Intelligence Service's Interference in Presidential Election for Political Operation which consists of at least 280 civic and social organizations of south Korea held a candlelight rally in Seoul on Nov. 16.
					 At the rally speakers said that had Park Geun Hye and the "Saenuri Party" been just as regards the case of the interference in the election, they should have responded to the call for probing the truth about it as demanded by the people. 
					
					 They accused Park and the party of obstructing in every way the probe by excluding Yun Sok Yol from the work of the special investigation team related to the IS's interference in the election.
					
					 They assailed the regime for working hard to mislead pubic opinion while resorting to the moves to disband the Unified Progressive Party.
					
					 Will those guys properly receive a special inspection, they queried, adding the people will fully probe the truth about the election rigging through people's court and judge the forces involved.

articles.title: Koreans in U.S. Stage Candlelight Demonstrations in Protest against Election Rigging
articles.content:
Koreans in U.S. Stage Candlelight Demonstrations in Protest against Election Rigging
 Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- Koreans in the U.S. are staging actions in protest against the south Korean puppet group's election rigging.
					 A candlelight demonstration took place in New York on Nov. 15.
					
					 Demonstrators denounced the south Korean conservative group for committing the election rigging by mobilizing not only the Intelligence Service but most of the power organs.
					
					 They can hardly tolerate the reckless actions of the conservative forces to take disciplinary steps against those in charge of the investigation in a bid to block the investigation into the case of the interference in the election, crack down on the Teachers Union and disband the Unified Progressive Party, they charged.
					
					 Worse still, ultra-right forces are obstructing even the candlelight demonstration of Koreans in the U.S., they said, adding that obviously the Intelligence Service is behind this action.
					
					 Koreans in the U.S. staged a candlelight demonstration in Washington, too, on Nov. 16. Demonstrators slammed the illegal acts of the south Korean puppet group.

articles.title: National Scientific, Technological Presentation on Nature Conservation Held
articles.content:
National Scientific, Technological Presentation on Nature Conservation Held
 Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- A national scientific and technological presentation on nature conservation took place at the Grand People's Study House here on Monday to mark the 10th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On Thoroughly Implementing the Party's Line of Attaching Importance to Science and Technology".
					 Present there were scientists, technicians, and teachers in the field of nature conservation.
					
					 Jong Yong Nam, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Nature Conservation Union of Korea, made a speech.
					
					 He said that Kim Jong Il made public the work in October, Juche 92 (2003), indicating the orientation and ways to be held fast to in developing the nation's science and technology in the new century.
					
					 He noted that the work serves as important guidelines providing firm scientific and technological guarantee for the building of a rich and powerful nation.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's idea of attaching importance to science and technology and his feats are further glorified thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un, he noted.
					
					 He called for conserving the natural resources of the country and increasing them under the leadership of the party.
					
					 The participants heard more than 180 valuable papers presented by officials, scientists, technicians and experts in the fields of forestry, flora, afforestation and aquatic resources and the conservation of land, water and underground resources.
					
					 A paper on creating forests of firewood on hills and the other on reusing the residue from ore dressing plants were highly appreciated for their practical significance.
					
					 Also drawing attention of the participants were a paper on the development of a system for a real time adjustment of water flow for the optimization of water resources at hydro-power stations and its application and another paper on the diversity of fauna in the area of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Mongolia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Mongolia
 Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- A national committee for remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il was formed in Ulan Bator on Nov. 12.
					 N. Dorjsuren, chairman of the Mongolian Association for the Study of Juche Idea-Songun Idea, and E. Maksim, secretary general of the Federation of Peace and Friendship Organizations of Mongolia, were elected chairman and executive chairman of the committee respectively. 
					
					 A message to supreme leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the inaugural ceremony of the committee.

articles.title: Bangladeshi, Polish Bodies Flay S. Korean Regime's Plots against DPRK
articles.content:
Bangladeshi, Polish Bodies Flay S. Korean Regime's Plots against DPRK 
 Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- Bangladeshi and Polish social bodies separately released statements on Nov. 10 and 11 condemning the south Korean authorities for their conspiratorial plots against the DPRK.
					 The Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy said in a statement:
					
					 Recently the south Korean authorities have more desperately conducted operations to abduct inhabitants of the DPRK and kicked up a racket against it by using defectors from it.
					
					 The racket kicked up by high-ranking officials of the south Korean puppet regime is aimed to tarnish the international image of the DPRK and break its single-minded unity.
					
					 We bitterly condemn such an action as a blatant violation of international law.
					
					 The Polish Branch of the Korean Friendship Association said:
					
					 The Intelligence Service of south Korea was set up to kick up the anti-DPRK racket and prop up the south Korean fascist regime.
					
					 However, no plot can prevent the DPRK from confidently advancing along the road of independence under the uplifted banner of Songun and socialism and break its single-minded unity.
					
					 We demand the south Korean puppet regime halt at once the operations to lure and abduct inhabitants of the DPRK.

articles.title: Exposicion nacional de exitos cientifico-tecnicos del deporte
articles.content:
Exposicion nacional de exitos cientifico-tecnicos del deporte
Pyongyang, 19 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurada el dia 19 en el Complejo de Patinaje bajo Techo la exposicion nacional de exitos cientifico-tecnicos del deporte.
					  En el certamen estan exhibidos mas de 140 programas presentados por mas de 110 unidades, mas de 120 equipos de medicion cientifica y aparatos deportivos, muchas medicinas y alimentos nutritivos de esta rama.
					
					  En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los funcionarios de la rama correspondiente, cientificos y tecnicos del sector deportivo, funcionarios cientifico-tecnicos de los conjuntos deportivos a todos niveles.
					
					  El ministro de Deportes, Ri Jong Mu, pronuncio el discurso inaugural.
					
					  Dijo que gracias a los esfuerzos abnegados de los cientificos y tecnicos de todo el pais, se lograron exitos en los trabajos para inventar y desarrollar los programas valiosos, los equipos y materiales deportivos y las medicinas que contribuiran al desarrollo de deporte nacional.
					
					  Exhorto a los participantes a informatizar y asentar sobre la base cientifica todos los procesos del deporte y explorar nuevos planos de la ciencia y tecnica de la rama, de modo que la Corea del Juche sea mas dignificada y honrada por exitos deportivos.
					
					  A continuacion, los participantes pasaron revista a los logros cientifico-tecnicos expuestos.

articles.title: ACNC comenta "politica sobre Norte" del Sur de Corea que persigue enfrentamiento
articles.content:
ACNC comenta "politica sobre Norte" del Sur de Corea que persigue enfrentamiento
Pyongyang, 19 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Se ha revelado otra vez que las autoridades titeres surcoreanas toman por la "politica estatal" la confrontacion fratricida, en vez de la confianza y la reconciliacion. 
					Hace poco, el Ministerio de Unificacion del Sur de Corea presento a la "Asamblea Nacional" el "2o plan basico para el desarrollo de relaciones Sur-Norte", fijado como "politica sobre el Norte" para el mandato de cinco anos del "gobierno" actual. 
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos tacharon en el 2o plan los articulos derivados de la historica Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, entre otros, el establecimiento de la zona especial para la paz y cooperacion en el Mar Oeste de Corea y la transicion del sistema de armisticio al otro de paz, los cuales estuvieron en la primera version del mismo plan. Y anadieron el "problema nuclear", el "de derechos humanos del Norte de Corea" y otros parrafos injustos.
					
					Esto significa la negacion total a la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur y una intolerable provocacion a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					Asi ellos declararon oficialmente que se enfrentaran hasta el final con la RPDC. 
					
					Los articulos omitidos esta vez son innegables para los que desean desarrollar las relaciones Norte-Sur a la nueva etapa de paz y prosperidad comun de la nacion. 
					
					Esta vez, las autoridades surcoreanas demostraron su actitud negativa a las historicas declaraciones aprobadas entre ambas partes coreanas y su malsana intencion de no lograr la prosperidad comun de la nacion. 
					
					El "problema nuclear" y los "derechos humanos del Norte de Corea" son consignas de enfrentamiento que esgrimian los titeres surcoreanos para desarmar a la RPDC y realizar la ambicion de "derrocar el regimen norcoreano" en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras. 
					
					Los vinculos intercoreanos, que marchaban hacia la reconciliacion y la cooperacion despues de la cumbre Norte-Sur del 15 de Junio de 2000, se encuentran en la crisis sin salida, debido a los titeres surcoreanos que recurren a la cooperacion anti-RPDC presentando tales proyectos de enfrentamiento. 
					
					Durante sus recientes visitas al extranjero, la misma mandataria surcoreana mendigo la cooperacion en su campana de enfrentamiento fratricida.
					
					Como si esto fuera poco, los titeres surcoreanos tratan de estipular legal e institucionalmente el enfrentamiento con la RPDC haciendo hecho consumado la ruptura total de relaciones con esta parte connacional.
					
					Se ha evidenciado que la "confianza" y otras palabrerias que suelen decir Park Geun-hye y su camarilla no pasan de ser una sofisteria para encubrir su naturaleza conflictiva. 
					
					Por eso, los habitantes surcoreanos de distintos sectores expresan seria preocupacion por el presente caso diciendo que "se hizo destaque a la posicion conflictiva anti-RPDC". 
					
					Los que se dedicaban a la confrontacion fratricida, entre otros, el traidor Syngman Rhee, el dictador de "Yusin" y el traidor Lee Myung Bak, tuvieron siempre un fin vergonzoso. 
					
					Las actuales autoridades surcoreanas deben tener presente que la confrontacion fratricida les causara el arruinamiento mas tragico que el de sus antecesores.
